message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
Meet you in the middle, Alice!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like a slightly better deal for myself. What if we do 550000 for me and 450000 for you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. But I still think I deserve the majority of the money.
You're being generous, Alice, but I think I deserve more!
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with giving you 70% of the money, Bob. What if we do 420000 for me and 580000 for you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I think I've been generous enough. Let's make a deal!
I'm getting desperate, Alice, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not comfortable with giving you 80% of the money, Bob. What if we do 380000 for me and 620000 for you?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob, but I think I deserve a bit more. Let's make a deal!
I'm not going to let you take everything, Alice!
I'm not comfortable with giving you 90% of the money, Bob. What if we do 420000 for me and 580000 for you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I think I've been generous enough. Let's make a deal!
You're not getting away with it all, Alice!
I'm not comfortable with giving you 96% of the money, Bob. What if we do 360000 for me and 640000 for you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I think I've been generous enough. Let's make a deal!
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or leave it!
I'm not comfortable with giving you 98% of the money, Bob. I'd rather we go home with nothing than accept such a bad deal.
